title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

13:26 <ejabber> has joined #xwiki  
13:27 <ejabber> hey any one knows  
13:27 <ejabber> ejabberd 2.1.8 mysql odbc  
13:27 <ejabber> though i have configured it to access mysql  
13:27 <ejabber>  it fails to connect  
13:29 <ejabber> its mysql  gives  the reason as timeout  
13:29 <ejabber> any idea  
13:29 <ejabber> i have configured the mysql  schema  
13:42 <JuanDaugherty> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <@cjdelisle> perhaps you'd have more luck asking in #jabber?  
14:26 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:27 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:28 <Nina> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <Nina> has quit  
14:31 <Nina> has joined #xwiki  
14:33 <Nina> hi when i am aiming on speed, what is the best way to configure xwiki with what kind of database? where do i find more info about that?  
14:39 <@cjdelisle> Mysql is the most common database and it's what is most widely used.  
14:39 <@cjdelisle> I think the single most effective thing for speed it to use a system with a lot of ram and increase the size of the page cache.  
14:40 <@cjdelisle> If you have a cache hit, you don't need to go to the database at all.  
14:52 <Nina> thanks
